name: Morden's Map of Lancashire (1695)
description: Robert Morden's county map of Lancashire from the 1695 edition of Camden's 'Britannia'. First county maps based on new surveys since Saxton.
notes:
Robert Morden (c.1650-1703).
Published in Gibson's 1695 edition of Camden's Britannia.
First county maps to show roads (following Ogilby's survey).
First maps with longitude/latitude and a scale bar.
Multiple editions: 1695, 1722, 1753.
NLS has digitized versions on Lancashire county maps page.
Also widely available on antiquemaps.com.
